title: Pink Chickens
content:
No,its not some kind of drug [Although many went into its creation] Its a comic drawn by Keener Patric Reid [Who still insists his brother is called Arthur'

Never heard of him? He's one of the many lurkers on this forum. [I know you can read this, join up for chrissakes!]

I have been begging him to Keen in his cartoons, and he did! And this weeks episode appeared in Krash, a kids and teens magazine, to be read by thousands. After months of nagging he has placed 8 Keen references into his latest comic. I have only found 2 so far.

So I scanned the whole lot and am hosting them for your beady eyes to run over. See if you can find all 8 references, you'll win a prize!*

1: [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/pchic.jpg[/img]

2: [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/pchic001.jpg[/img]

3: [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/pchic002.jpg[/img]

4: [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/pchic003.jpg[/img]


[*Prize may not actually exist]

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Pink Chickens
content: Hmm...that's tricky - I can only see the 'bloog' and SGA ones...

title: Hmm... *investigates*
content:
This comic is confusing at first... lots of stuff happening all over the place. Amusing nonetheless.

Lessee... firstly, that "captain" bit is probably a tad too subtle to be a reference... of course, the 'blooog' bit... does she always have that teddy? ... the SGA on the fridge ... the pole... maybe the green stuff in the fridge is an allusion to Vitalin ... there could be something in those bits of 'scary message' text along the edges of the frames in the fridge episode, but it's difficult to read theim in their entirety at this resolution.

So I've found about 3-5. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Hmm... *investigates*
content:
Is that the Omegamatic in the bottom center panel of the first one?

EDIT: Never mind, I was thinking that was space. I see what it actually is now.

"NEEK!" is "!KEEN" backwards, isn't it?________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: Hmm... *investigates*
content: Hmm, and just below the 'NEEK' (second link) there's a red happy face which could be a Bounder...

title: Ah...
content:
Oohh, I thought that said, "NEEN!" Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

title: Re: Ah...
